author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE HONE SOUTH OF SOUTH POINT ON THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...HURRICANE HONE SOUTH OF SOUTH POINT ON THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 3:05 AM HST Sun Aug 25
 the center of Hone was located near 18.2, -155.8
 with movement W at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 991 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
